name: authentication
title: Authentication
description: Learn how to pass your credentials to Kaltura's API and create a Kaltura Session
notes: Should report an error if the wrong credentials are entered

control_sets.title: Starting a KalturaSession
control_sets.tip:
Start a KalturaSession (ks) by supplying your Partner ID and Admin Secret.

You can find your info in the [Kaltura Management Console](http://kmc.kaltura.com/index.php/kmc/kmc4#account|integration)

control_sets.title: Checking the KS
control_sets.tip: You can validate your Kaltura session by calling ```user.get``` without a User ID, which will return the details of the user associated with the current session
